articles.title: Baidu's Ernie AI chatbot to power Samsung's new Galaxy S24 smartphones - CNBC
articles.description: Chinese tech giant Baidu will partner Samsung to integrate its Ernie chatbot capabilities into Galaxy S24 smartphones.
articles.content:
Baidu AI Cloud will be integrating its Ernie chatbot into Samsung's Galaxy S24 smartphones, allowing users to translate calls in real time, among other features.
